text: President Trump has ruled out U.S. ground troops in Ukraine, instead focusing on air power to support a planned European force.
creator: Lara Seligman

text: Survivors of disasters must now have an email address to access government aid through FEMA, potentially excluding those without internet connectivity. Workers at FEMA worry this could be a problem.
creator: Molly Taft

text: Israel is calling up 60,000 reservists for an invasion of Gaza City as more citizens want the war to end in a deal that frees remaining hostages held by Hamas.
creator: Anat Peled

text: President Putin has labeled President Zelensky as the West's illegitimate puppet, making it unlikely for Trump to broker a meeting between the two leaders to end the war in Ukraine.
creator: Thomas Grove

text: OpenAI employee stock sale values ChatGPT maker at $500 billion, making it the world's most valuable privately held company.
creator: Cade Metz and Natallie Rocha

text: U.S. Allies Still Waiting for Tariff Relief on Autos and Steel
creator: Jason Douglas

text: Meta is restructuring its AI division amid internal tensions over the technology. The move is part of CEO Mark Zuckerberg's efforts to refocus the company on AI research and development.
creator: Mike Isaac and Eli Tan

text: The Trump administration has withdrawn its request for Apple to create a back door for law enforcement agencies in Britain to access customer data.
creator: Tripp Mickle

text: A former POW has a final wish to spend his twilight inside the Kim regime he never stopped fighting for, after seven decades in the South.
creator: Dasl Yoon

text: Ant-smuggling boom fueled by government staffing cuts. US market seen as gold mine by international sellers.
creator: Kate Knibbs

text: A super-energetic neutrino that reached Earth in 2023 has been confirmed to be real, but scientists still don't know where it came from.
creator: Jorge Garay

text: The West Texas measles outbreak has ended after killing two children, with state health officials confirming the outbreak's end. The undervaccinated community was the source of the outbreak.
creator: Emily Mullin

text: The Trump Administration is discussing taking a 10% stake in Intel to help the struggling chipmaker and ensure the US maintains its edge in the technology industry.
creator: Lauren Hirsch and Tripp Mickle

text:
Sure, here is a 2-line summary of the article "The End of Handwriting":

Writing by hand may be on the brink of extinction as smartphones and computers threaten to replace it entirely. Despite this, some argue that the loss of handwriting could have unintended consequences for creativity and cognitive development.
creator: Angela Watercutter

text: A.I. travel tools can assist with trip planning and loyalty program optimization, but they may not replace Google Flights for flight search just yet.
creator: Gabe Castro-Root
